listitem.para: Selects turtle index for control. If the turtle was not previously activated, then all turtles from zero to index, are activated. From now until you select another turtle, all turtle operations will occur on the selected turtle.

programlisting.userinput: ; 3D Example PERSPECTIVE CLEARSCREEN ; Draw a cube from the default vantage point REPEAT 4 [REPEAT 4 [FORWARD 100 RIGHT 90] FORWARD 100 DOWNPITCH 90]

; 3D Example with moving eye PERSPECTIVE CLEARSCREEN SETTURTLE -1 ; select the "eye position" turtle SETXYZ 500 500 500 SETTURTLE 0 ; Draw a cube from a new vantage point REPEAT 4 [REPEAT 4 [FORWARD 100 RIGHT 90] FORWARD 100 DOWNPITCH 90]
